long_description: Designed with a low profile so you can ride the lifts, the Marmot Sidecountry 20 Snow Pack keeps your backcountry essentials organized and carries your skis or board while you hike. Low-profile design easily holds gloves, layers, snacks and more; pack features a vertical snowboard carry and a diagonal or A-frame ski carry. Molded back panel offers comfort, and easily sheds snow when you place your pack on the ground. Shoulder straps and webbing waistbelt keep pack close. Shovel-and-probe-compatible front pocket keeps backcountry items organized and easily accessed. Marmot Sidecountry 20 Snow Pack features an interior hydration pocket and an Insulated hydration sleeve on shoulder strap, reservoir not included. Internal mesh pocket features a key clip; stretch goggles pocket keeps optics separate. Made of 420-denier nylon fabric for durability. Closeout.
short_description: Designed with a low profile so you can ride the lifts, the Marmot Sidecountry 20 Snow Pack keeps your backcountry essentials organized and carries your skis or board while you hike.
